analyzed: dhamma paccanīya anuloma tika duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi
sani dassana ttika kilesa duka ādi

original: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nokilesaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho kileso dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na sa nidassana sa ppaṭigham no kilesam dhammam paṭicca anidassana appaṭighaḥ kilesaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā
